meanings.definition: A device that allows a spacecraft to travel faster than the speed of light.
meanings.sent1: The hyperdrives on the spaceship hummed softly as they propelled the craft through space.
meanings.sent2: The crew relied on the hyperdrives to reach distant galaxies in record time.
meanings.sent3: The hyperdrives seemed to have a mind of their own, zipping the ship across the universe.
meanings.sent4: Her ambition was like hyperdrives, propelling her towards her dreams at an incredible speed.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering glow of the hyperdrives illuminated the cockpit, mesmerizing the crew.

meanings.definition: To propel a spacecraft faster than the speed of light using a hyperdrive.
meanings.sent1: The captain hyperdrives the ship through the vast expanse of space effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: They hyperdrives their way through the galaxy, breaking all known speed records.
meanings.sent3: The alien spaceship hyperdrives past Earth, leaving astronomers baffled.
meanings.sent4: His determination hyperdrives him towards success, surpassing all expectations.
meanings.sent5: The hyperdrive technology revolutionized space travel, allowing ships to hyperdrive to distant stars.

meanings.definition: The hyperdrive malfunctioned during the space mission.
meanings.sent1: The unexpected failure of the hyperdrives left the crew stranded in deep space.
meanings.sent2: Repairing the hyperdrive became the top priority to ensure the mission's success.
meanings.sent3: The comical robot blamed the hyperdrive malfunction on space gremlins.
meanings.sent4: The hyperdrive glitch turned the routine mission into a thrilling space adventure.
meanings.sent5: The ominous warning lights signaled trouble in the hyperdrive system, creating tension onboard.
